flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: This is what the finished product will look like.
lines.text_raw: This is what the finished product will look like.

lines.text: Start with Origami paper color side down.
lines.text_raw: Start with Origami paper color side down.

lines.text: Fold corner to corner, making an X in the paper as in picture #2.
lines.text_raw: Fold corner to corner, making an X in the paper as in picture #2.

lines.text: Turn paper over to color side. Fold in half in both directions, making a "+" in the paper as in picture #3.
lines.text_raw: Turn paper over to color side. Fold in half in both directions, making a "+" in the paper as in picture #3.

lines.text: Collapse along creases.
lines.text_raw: Collapse along creases.

lines.text: The result should look like picture #2.
lines.text_raw: The result should look like picture #2.

lines.text: Lay flap on table. Fold down the top point. This is really up to you. This fold will be making the "knot" in the middle of the bow.
lines.text_raw: Lay flap on table. Fold down the top point. This is really up to you. This fold will be making the "knot" in the middle of the bow.

lines.text: Open unit up. As you can see, there is a square in the center.
lines.text_raw: Open unit up. As you can see, there is a square in the center.

lines.text: Collapse the center square into the center as shown in picture #3.
lines.text_raw: Collapse the center square into the center as shown in picture #3.

lines.text: Picture #1 shows what your paper should look like after collapsing the square.
lines.text_raw: Picture #1 shows what your paper should look like after collapsing the square.

lines.text: Fold each side into the center using that center crease line as your guide. (Picture #2)
lines.text_raw: Fold each side into the center using that center crease line as your guide. (Picture #2)

lines.text: Continue on the other side. Flip over and repeat on the other side of paper.
lines.text_raw: Continue on the other side. Flip over and repeat on the other side of paper.

lines.text: Picture #1 shows all creases folded.
lines.text_raw: Picture #1 shows all creases folded.

lines.text: Gently open the unit from the bottom upwards. Make sure to keep the previous creases intact.
lines.text_raw: Gently open the unit from the bottom upwards. Make sure to keep the previous creases intact.

lines.text: Picture #3 shows the end result.
lines.text_raw: Picture #3 shows the end result.

lines.text: Turn the unit over as in picture #1.
lines.text_raw: Turn the unit over as in picture #1.

lines.text: Cut along the folded crease as in  picture #2.
lines.text_raw: Cut along the folded crease as in  picture #2.

lines.text: Continue with the other 3 folds. The result should look like picture #3.
lines.text_raw: Continue with the other 3 folds. The result should look like picture #3.

lines.text: Fold the top down to the bottom. (Picture #1)
lines.text_raw: Fold the top down to the bottom. (Picture #1)

lines.text: Fold sides down making a point on both sides. (Picture #2)
lines.text_raw: Fold sides down making a point on both sides. (Picture #2)

lines.text: Repeat on the other side. (Picture #3)
lines.text_raw: Repeat on the other side. (Picture #3)

lines.text: Cut up the center of both pages. Cut all the way up to the square.
lines.text_raw: Cut up the center of both pages. Cut all the way up to the square.

lines.text: Fold over as much as you like on the inside edge. (Picture #1)
lines.text_raw: Fold over as much as you like on the inside edge. (Picture #1)

lines.text: Fold the outer edge in. (Picture #2)
lines.text_raw: Fold the outer edge in. (Picture #2)

lines.text: It is for you to decide how much paper to fold here. There isn't a "correct" way to fold these.
lines.text_raw: It is for you to decide how much paper to fold here. There isn't a "correct" way to fold these.

lines.text: Turn over.
lines.text_raw: Turn over.

lines.text: Cut the ribbon strands however you'd like. I like making points, but you can do it whatever way you prefer.
lines.text_raw: Cut the ribbon strands however you'd like. I like making points, but you can do it whatever way you prefer.

lines.text: Take the point on the left and roll it toward the center. Tuck it under the square as in picture #2.
lines.text_raw: Take the point on the left and roll it toward the center. Tuck it under the square as in picture #2.

lines.text: Repeat on other side. (Picture #3)
lines.text_raw: Repeat on other side. (Picture #3)

lines.text: Your beautiful bow is finished. Make some more and have fun decorating with them.
lines.text_raw: Your beautiful bow is finished. Make some more and have fun decorating with them.

guide.summary: Decorate your gifts with a personalized origami bow.
guide.title: Origami Bow
